name: Fruit Match Mania: Sweet Treat Revenge - Free Game!
name_original: Fruit Match Mania: Sweet Treat Revenge - Free Game!
description: Fruit Madness!  Drag your finger to link similar fruits together in a chain to destroy them and rack up points.  The longer the chain, the bigger the bonus.  Exciting gameplay that will keep you on the edge of your seats.  Grab it today!
